long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
X Unfollower is a smart Twitter unfollow tool that helps you streamline your Twitter connections by automatically unfollowing inactive and smaller accounts. This extension allows you to focus on quality connections and maintain a more engaging Twitter feed.

ðŸ’¡ Features
âœ“ Smart Filtering: Automatically unfollow inactive accounts and those with fewer followers based on your customizable thresholds for inactivity period and minimum follower count.
âœ“ Tailored Exclusions: Exclude accounts that follow you back or are verified, ensuring you maintain desired connections.
âœ“ Whitelisting: Protect specific accounts from being unfollowed, safeguarding important connections.
âœ“ Bulk Management: Review the filtered list and bulk unfollow selected or all accounts with a single click, ensuring efficient list curation.

Optimize your Twitter experience by focusing on quality connections and engaging content with X Unfollower's powerful, user-friendly unfollowing tool.
